turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi sweetie, can you possibly order me some Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing! Which location you wanna pick it up at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 150 University Boulevard, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: In Morehead?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's the one!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Gotcha. What's your order today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think I'm going to try something new. How about their Blonde Cinnamon Cloud Macchiato?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That sounds delicious. What size you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's go with Venti.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alrighty, Venti it is.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd also like to get it made with almond milk, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You got it. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, actually I don't want the cinnamon on top of that either. Just the caramel drizzle.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay! So that's a Venti Blonde Cinnamon Cloud Macchiato made with almond milk, with no cinnamon on top. Right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep, that's right!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alrighty, your order has been placed. It'll be ready to pick up shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you, dear! What's the total on that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It came out to $4.63, and they said they'll be sending your receipt via text to your phone.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Wonderful! Thanks again. Bye bye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anytime! Talk to you later.
